titles.title: Fifteen Minutes Before We Really Date

title: Maji de Tsukiau 15-funmae
title_synonyms: Fifteen Minutes Before We Really Date
synopsis:
Yuuki and Natsuha are childhood friends who live in the same apartment complex. Due to their intimate bond, there are constant rumors of the two going out together. Nonetheless, their time in high school is on the brink of ending, and they both expect to graduate without a romantic partner—that is, until Yuuki suddenly suggests they start dating!

Despite the abrupt shift, their long-lasting friendship swiftly turns into passionate love. With college on the horizon, Yuuki and Natsuha only have a few months left together. Having missed many past opportunities to share their affection for one another, the couple resolves to quickly understand their new relationship in order to make the most of what remains of their high school romance.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
background: Maji de Tsukiau 15-funmae is a web manga released on the author's Twitter and pixiv accounts from September 16, 2019, to January 29, 2023, and published in print by Kadokawa from February 26, 2021, to April 26, 2023. The web manga was published as doujinshi from December 30, 2019, to March 3, 2023, when the volumes were released at Comic Market 97, 98, and 99. The series was published in English as 15 Minutes Before We Really Date by Yen Press from November 21, 2023, to October 15, 2024.
